titles.title: To amend title 1, United States Code, to provide for a definition of the term "State" and to include territories therein, and for other purposes.
To amend title 1, United States Code, to provide for a definition of the term "State" and to include territories therein, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.
